channel.title: Far world
channel.description: Anyone ever checked it out? I tried to go but I couldn't figure out how to teleport my player to z coor 13,000,000. It sounds pretty strange there, but I kinda wanna go.

item.title: Far world
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:5, topic:392887”][quote author=Frell link=topic=490059.msg3583366#msg3583366 date=1303959305]

From what I understand, after (and around) 2147000000 blocks from 0 it will start replacing blocks, glitching, slow gameplay, etc.

Sounds like the max cash in runescape also, because of something to do with java.
[/quote]
Well, I know MC uses some 64bit ints, I don’t see why he didn’t use one there (although it would be useless as it would take ages to get that far i admit)[/quote]

fly mod + super clock control, jam a penny in the W key and just go

Read full topic

item.title: Far world
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:4, topic:392887”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=490059.msg3583334#msg3583334 date=1303956873]
From what I understand, after (and around) 2147000000 blocks from 0 it will start replacing blocks, glitching, slow gameplay, etc.
[/quote]
Sounds like the max cash in runescape also, because of something to do with java.[/quote]
Well, I know MC uses some 64bit ints, I don’t see why he didn’t use one there (although it would be useless as it would take ages to get that far i admit)

Read full topic

item.title: Far world
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

MC wiki said that happens at 13,000,000, and by 32,000,000 light no longer exists (torches, lava, etc).
